reviews.title: Apple with worms
reviews.pros: Pay, perks, remote work, visibility of product and brand
reviews.advice: Brian controls everything, which is fine but his "intuitive, gut, creative instinct" goes against data and yet no one will tell him "no". You are micromanaged to death and not allowed to have any ideas on strategy. Most functional leaders are miserable. Everyone says "It's the Apple way" but Apple actually had innovative ideas, which makes a huge difference in the culture.

reviews.title: Great Place to work, but no job security
reviews.pros: Company really lives by its values and does everything possible to make their employees feel included and happy.
reviews.cons: Define KPIs better and make informed decisions while it comes to employee ratings and absolutely no job security.
reviews.advice: Please do not change job titles of employees after 6 months of hiring them if you eventually plan on laying them off, I was hired for the role of operations analyst which was a suitable job title as per my experience, but the Head of our department decided on changing the title since they "hated" the word operations, and now when I'm job-hunting basis of my previous title not finding anything relevant. Please think about your employee's future while making such abrupt changes.
